name: Retro Space Game
description:
Developed by: Calvin Le and Joshua Soran

Retro Space Game is a collaborative student project developed for Lawrence Technological University's MCS3033 course.

Pilot your ship through waves of enemies and see how long you can last! Beware of the boss ship and his two sentinels!

Features:

* Infinity incremented wave system with progressive difficulty and score tracking!

* Multiple power-ups and custom visual effects!

* Various enemy NPCs and Boss mechanics!

* Local score save data!

How To Play:

- Use WASD to move player ship.

- Press Left Mouse Button to shoot

- Press 'E' for Area of Effect EMP attack.
